title: BOTS destroying the game
body:
Getting so many games lately where most players are third party BOTS !! All the time spent waiting for a game...and that rubbish happens. 

What is RIOT doing about this...or is it time to stop spending my money here and go elsewhere ??

replies.body:
[OK, so](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/lUiAmREN-bots) [this topic](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/evmR7gIE-bots-in-aram) [comes up at least](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/E7qkfmzt-bots)[ 5x](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/oLlIKqJy-bots) [a day](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/rpXnfE6J-3-lvling-bot-in-one-game). [You would have thought that people check previous topics or utilise the search bar. ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/EsOn1FRu-does-riot-ever-ban-the-scripters-in-coop-vs-ai-games) {<- that particular link is from an hour ago)

Anyway...

_Riot do know about the bots in aram and co-op vs ai games_.** They cant do anything about it unless these bots are consistently getting reported.** The best you can do is report the bots and move on. A fun thing to do is create a long list of bots (30+ names) and send it along as a support ticket to Riot. As there isn't really a category for this, you could probably just file it under "general enquiry"._ Only do it if you have a substantial list of names otherwise it just gets spammy. _

I know from experience that bots are worse in pre-30 arams, as well as intermediate bot games. You can play a custom game vs intermediate bots or stick to beginner bots if it is annoying you too much.
